name: Shell (itch) (MonadoBoy64)
description:
Shell is a game made by Team Shell for the Armed Forces Jam 2022, where you play as a tank and you must shoot at buildings. To destroy them to create a clear path to the goal for a runaway nuke truck. If the nuke touches something, it explodes and it's game over.

Challenge Statement: Didn't aim for one.

Credits:

Nicholas Walton-Project Leader, Game Design, and Programming

Jeremy Dandeneau-3D Modeler

Jeremiah Garcia-3D Modeler

SFXS: TechnoTiger, SoundEffectsFactory, W1NTER ♃, SOUND FX, Sound Effect, Gaming Sound Effects Library, TheMSsoundeffects, and Sound Alfa.

Music: Kevin MacLeod
